GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
RDMA/siw: Fix QP destroy to wait for all references dropped.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 0ed8bf9d0bb19f3f5eedd73f04aaf5bba9ac0737, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit 303ae1cdfdf7280ff4cfbbe65563b5ff15bb025b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: RDMA/siw: Fix QP destroy to wait for all references dropped.
